WRONG_CREDENTIALS: Either email or password is wrong
REQUIRED_FIELDS: You need to pass one of these field. id || email || number
ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST: Account not exist with given details
OTP_SENT: An otp is sent to you mobile number
OTP_NOT_SENT: Something is wrong could't not sent otp to your number.
CONTACT_USERNOTEXITS: No user exist with given contact number
USER_NOTEXIST: User not exist with given user id.
OLD_NEW_PASS: New password cannot be the same as old password
PARENT_CAT_NOT_EXIST: No parent category exist with given id
DUPLICATE_CAT_NAME: A category with the same name already exist
DUPLICATE_PRODUCT_NAME: A product with the same name already exist
DUPLICATE_KEY_NAME: A key with the same name already exist
CATEGORY_NOT_EXIST_WITH_ID: No category exist with given id
PRODUCT_NOT_EXIST: Product not exist for given id
ATTRIBUTE_NAME_EXIST: An attribute with this name already exist
VARIATION_NAME_EXIST: An variation with this name already exist
NO_VARIATION_EXIST_WITH_ID: No variation exist with this id
HEADERS_REQUIRED: You must have to pass headers
TOKEN_REQUIRED: You must have to pass token in headers
PRODUCT_VARIENT_NOT_EXIST: Product varient not exist for given id
RENAME_FILE_ERROR: Something went wrong while changing filename
UPLOAD_FILE_ERROR: Something went wrong while uploading file
MOVE_ERROR: Something went wrong while moving file
